bug.short_desc: SELinux is preventing newaliases from 'read' accesses on the lnk_file log.
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: SELinux is preventing newaliases from 'read' accesses on the lnk_file log.
***** Plugin catchall (100. confidence) suggests **************************
If cree que de manera predeterminada, newaliases debería permitir acceso read sobre log lnk_file. Then debería reportar esto como un error. Puede generar un módulo de política local para permitir este acceso. Do allow this access for now by executing: # ausearch -c 'newaliases' --raw | audit2allow -M my-newaliases # semodule -X 300 -i my-newaliases.pp
Additional Information: Source Context system_u:system_r:sendmail_t:s0 Target Context system_u:object_r:tmpfs_t:s0 Target Objects log [ lnk_file ] Source newaliases Source Path newaliases Port <Unknown> Host (removed) Source RPM Packages Target RPM Packages Policy RPM selinux-policy-3.13.1-224.fc25.noarch Selinux Enabled True Policy Type targeted Enforcing Mode Enforcing Host Name (removed) Platform Linux (removed) 4.8.10-300.fc25.x86_64 #1 SMP Mon Nov 21 18:59:16 UTC 2016 x86_64 x86_64 Alert Count 2 First Seen 2016-12-03 10:34:55 CET Last Seen 2016-12-03 10:34:55 CET Local ID 114c9679-ee20-45b8-a882-655b5287fb02
Raw Audit Messages type=AVC msg=audit(1480757695.318:526): avc: denied { read } for pid=14387 comm="newaliases" name="log" dev="tmpfs" ino=109443 scontext=system_u:system_r:sendmail_t:s0 tcontext=system_u:object_r:tmpfs_t:s0 tclass=lnk_file permissive=0
Hash: newaliases,sendmail_t,tmpfs_t,lnk_file,read
Version-Release number of selected component: selinux-policy-3.13.1-224.fc25.noarch
Additional info: reporter: libreport-2.8.0 hashmarkername: setroubleshoot kernel: 4.8.11-300.fc25.x86_64 type: libreport
